summary: The MOD is a Stand-alone followers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/rHgHRyv.png[/img][/center][center][youtube]R3XkOIMIBz0[/youtube] [youtube]OFV4Ja8xVCU[/youtube] [youtube]vOavLw1K_VM[/youtube][/center]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=4]About[/size][/color]
[size=2]- The MOD is a stand-alone followers.[/size]

[color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Requirement[/size][/color]
[size=2]- Skyrim version 1.9.32+[/size]



[color=#a4c2f4][size=4]Character[/size][/color]
- Level at the lowest value of 10, the highest value is 100.
- Dress uses the vanilla of clothes. be able to freely exchange the clothes. (The reference to the recommended MOD.)
- Followers do not have a weapon.

[line]
[center][line][img]http://i.imgur.com/0P3hLKZ.png[/img][/center][img]http://i.imgur.com/uqBEgSZ.png[/img]
[size=4]Name: [b][color=#00ffff]Kotone[/color][/b][/size]
[size=2]- Two-handed is good.
- Marriage possible.[/size]

[color=#ffe599][size=3]Location: Whiterun Guard Barracks (Gate in Whiterun)[/size][/color]
[line][img]http://i.imgur.com/SnoUVc0.png[/img]
[size=4]Name: [b][color=#00ffff]Kaya[/color][/b][/size]
[size=2]- Destruction is good. (Ice and Shock)
- Magicka value is 5000 so that it does not lack.
- Marriage possible.[/size]

[color=#ffe599][size=3]Location: Whiterun Holl of the Dead[/size][/color]
[line][img]http://i.imgur.com/c1zKAzF.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Name: [color=#00ffff]Saki Hagakure[/color][/b][/size]
- Dual wielding and Light Armor is good.
- Marriage possible.

[color=#ffe599][size=3]Location: Riverwood Trader[/size][/color]
[line]
[line]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/H01nfkD.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SjWglwz.png[/img]
[size=3][b]Name: [color=#00ffff]Charlotte Fontaine[/color][/b][/size]
- Heavy armor and one-Hand is good.
- Marriage possible.

[color=#ffe599][size=3]Loaction: Solitude The Winking Skeever[/size][/color]
[line]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/wWrJjqql.png[/img][/center][center][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#c27ba0][size=3]ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15983/?]True Vision ENB 0.262final[/url] by Bronze316

[/size][/color][/font][size=3]Recommended Japanese Style MODs[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49292/?]Kankaraya[/url] by KANRA
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43281/?]Wafuku[/url] by Jibunn
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58333/?]Kisetsu Kimono for UNP by Yurica[/url] by yurica
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64097/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44547/?]Akaviri Follower reiko and Armory - Standalone[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64097/?][/url] by Leito86
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55524/?]Wa Ribbon[/url] by Higeyosi
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34928/?]Ancient Blades Weapons[/url] by COTS

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53872/?]Fudou Myouou Katana and Tachi[/url] by China-YKK Morai cat
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8489/?]Katana Crafting[/url] by lautasantenni
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53798/?]Bishu Osafune ju Morikage Katana and Tachi[/url] by CHINA[/center][line]


[size=3]Credits
K's Hairdo's Final by Kalilies, Shocky and Stealthic
SG Hair Pack 268 by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] by Apachii

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE-[/url] by Caliente Ousnius and Jeir
High Poly Hands and Feet v2 by Halofarm

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url] by ECE team
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35713/?]ECEE - RANs Enhanced Character Edit Enhancer[/url] by RAN46

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url] by HHaleyy
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61178/?]Adorable Face[/url] by Lumina
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by Hello Santa

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] by Hvergelmir
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?]Pretty Face Darker Eyebrows (Pretty Face)[/url] by tktk

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by Gabriel Mailhot
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56056/?]MIkan Eyes[/url] by nerune
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?]Natural Eyes[/url] by nevenbridge
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]Eye Normal Map Fix[/url] by Mr Dave
[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/498/?]High Quality Eyes [/url]by Xenius

[/size][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] by Diethardt
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] by XP32[/size]

[size=3]Permission[/size]
Distribution of the translation file is free, but it is prohibited to redistribute the MOD files in other sites.
It is welcome to share information this MOD in the blog. But please do not always forget the link to the Nexus.
It's not just for me. Please respect the intention of modders that provides us with the resources.
Thank you.
